contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox Film | name = Zombie High | image = Zombie High.jpg | caption = | screenplay = | story = | director = [[Ron Link (director)|Ron Link]] | producer = [[Cassian Elwes]] (executive producer)<br>[[Aziz Ghazal]] (producer)<br>[[Elliott Kastner]] (producer)<br>[[Sebastian Serrell-Watts]] (associate producer)<br>[[Marc Toberoff]] (producer) | writer = Tim Doyle<br>Aziz Ghazal<br>Elizabeth Passerelli | starring = [[Virginia Madsen]] | music = Daniel May | cinematography = Brian Coyne<br>David Lux | editing = Shawn Hardin<br>James Whitney | studio = [[Cinema Group]] | distributor = [[Palisades Entertainment Group]] | released = October 2, 1987 | runtime = 93 min | country = United States | language = English | budget = | gross = | preceded_by = | followed_by = }} '''''Zombie High''''' is a 1987 film starring [[Virginia Madsen]]. ==Plot== A teenage girl gains a scholarship to an all-male [[boarding school]], but soon discovers that her classmates are becoming personality-less drones. As she investigates the school, she discovers the faculty may be experimenting on students. ==Cast== *[[Virginia Madsen]] - Andrea *[[Paul Feig]] - Emerson *[[Sherilyn Fenn]] - Suzi *[[Clare Carey]] - Mary Beth *[[Scott Coffey]] - Felner *[[Richard Cox (actor)|Richard Cox]] - Philo *[[Kay E. Kuter]] - Dean Eisner *[[Henry Sutton]]{{disambiguation needed|date=May 2013}} - Bell *[[Walter Addison]] as Chief Hillis *[[Christopher Peters]] as Phillip *[[Christopher Crews]] as Biff *[[James Wilder (actor)|James Wilder]] as Barry *[[John Sack (actor)|John Sack]] as Senator Felner *[[Paul Williams (actor)|Paul Williams]] - Ignatius *[[Susan Barnes (actress)|Susan Barnes]] - Mom ==Legacy== *The film's title was also used for a fictional-show-within-a-show as Miley Stewart's one-time crush, Jake Ryan starred as the main character on the real show ''[[Hannah Montana]]''. ==External links== *{{IMDb title|id=0094383}} * {{Amg movie|56172}} [[Category:American horror films]] [[Category:Zombie comedy films]] [[Category:American teen films]] [[Category:1987 horror films]] [[Category:1980s teen films]] [[Category:High school films]] [[Category:1980s comedy horror films]] {{comedy-horror-film-stub}}
